sect2.title: Unicode support
sect2.para: WinMerge 2.1 is distributed with ANSI executable (WinMerge.exe) for Windows 95/98/ME and UNICODE executable (WinMergeU.exe) for Windows NT /200/XP. UNICODE executable supports UCS-2 and UTF-8 UNICODE files and UNICODE filenames.

sect2.title: Shell integration
sect2.para: WinMerge 2.1 can be integrated into Windows Shell. Shell integration adds "Winmerge" menuitem to Windows Explorer's context menu for easy and fast comparing files and directories.

sect2.title: Generating patches
sect2.para: GNU/diffutils compatible patch files can be created from two files. Several formats and compare options are supported.

sect2.title: Plugins
sect2.para: Plugins are now supported to preprocess files before actual compare or to extend editor functionality. Plugins can be programmed using several languages supporting COM. Example plugins are included.

listitem.para: More columns added (e.g. file attributes), shown columns can be selected and reordered.
Filtered items have now own category and icons. Filtered items can be set to hidden/visible from View-menu.
Floating statusbar during compare process, compare can be stopped and files/dirs compared so far are shown
Newer file/dir is shown with asterisk (*) in date field
One or both directories can be set read-only, preventing accidental overwrites
Enchanged EOL handling (if feature enabled, documents can contain several EOL styles)
Linenumber, column and line length shown in statusbar
One ot both files can be set read-only to prevent accidentally changing file
Copy difference to left/right and advance to next makes merging faster
Diff pane to show current difference in two vertical panes
Feature to highlight difference in lines
